# Computer Networking Primer {#sec-networking-primer}

As interesting as computers are by themselves, they are infinitely more so when they talk to each other --- especially in the context of my thesis, which would be completely uninteresting without networking.

This appendix gives a basic introduction to computer networking. It is not intended to be a comprehensive reference nor even entirely accurate; its purpose is solely to provide enough background that the rest of my thesis is understandable.
